message.body: Yeah I work at the cira center on 30th st. I have off for mem day thank god. Haha. Do u?
Hell yeaa ..u doin anything fun.? U work for Amtrak??
Nah. I work for a financial advisory. I don't really have any set plans for memorial day. Do u?
My friend might visit from outta town . Not confirmed yet though.would u wanna get together maybe?
Yeah that would be fun!
OK I will let u know what my friend ends up doing. U work for black rock?
Haha nah. But they are in my building. I work for mycio wealth partners
u have a finance degree?
Nope. Just a regular old economics degree. Haha
How do u like being an advisor. I flirted with becoming one when I graduated
It's ok. But I don't love it. Probs cause my boss is a dick and makes us work long hours. Haha. Were u a finance major?
Yeah at temple. R u all commission?
Nope. We are only fee based.
so Ur salaried?
Yeah. The partner that I work for has all of the clients and we do the grunt work. Haha.
Oh that's good. I wasn't into tryna find clients
Then I worked with fas at prudential a few yes ago. So I never meet clients
Yeah. I would hate cold calling so thank god i dont have to bring in clients.
So what r these long hrs u have to work??
I usually have to work till 8ish. Which isn't terrible for finance but still isn't fun. Haha. What kinda hours do u work?
dammm r u at work now??? When do u go in??
Just leaving work. I get in at 830
Well I am supposed to get in at 830. I usually get in at 845. Haha
Holy fuck dude. Unless Ur making bank that ain't right! I got the sweet life. 9-415
Are u serious? I am so jealous. And nope I don't get paid much but my bosses do. Lol
Yeah there's def some perks working for the government and being unionized.
How long u been there. Is there opportunity for upward mobility
Yeah there is. It's not to terrible. I am def jealous of the unionized job tho. Hahaa

Yeah Ur def be making overtime money. I'd go crazy work in that many hours. I'm def grateful I have a good work life balance. That's why I'm so reluctant to leave my job even for one that pays much better
So long as u like ur job u should stay!
Yea good advice. Nobody likes working tho!!
